title: How to Make a Mcgangbang

steps.headline: Order a McDouble and a McChicken.
steps.description: If you want anything else like fries or a drink, order that too.

steps.headline: Wait for them to make it.
Open the McDouble separating the 2 beef patties.
Put the entire McChicken, bun and all, in between the two patties of the McDouble.
Close it up again so that its one really thick sandwich.

tyn: $2 if everything is on the dollar menu. Plus sales tax in some areas.
text: Order a McDouble and a McChicken. If you want anything else like fries or a drink, order that too. Wait for them to make it.  Pick up your food.  Open the McDouble separating the 2 beef patties.  Put the entire McChicken, bun and all, in between the two patties of the McDouble.  Close it up again so that its one really thick sandwich.
sentences: Order a McDouble and a McChicken.
If you want anything else like fries or a drink, order that too.
Wait for them to make it.
Open the McDouble separating the 2 beef patties.
Put the entire McChicken, bun and all, in between the two patties of the McDouble.
Close it up again so that its one really thick sandwich.
